title: The Adventures of Frank Alexander: The Marketing Marvel

story.text: Frank Alexander, a seasoned marketing advisor, discovers an unusual power during a regular meeting. Whenever he gives advice, he can now literally illuminate ideas, causing them to glow brightly in the minds of his clients.
Excited but cautious, Frank tests his newfound ability in a small agency workshop. To his amazement, his glowing advice leads to immediate breakthroughs in stalled projects.
During a networking event, Frank cautiously uses his power to help a struggling startup. Word spreads about the miraculous advisor whose insights spark not only ideas but visible enthusiasm.
Frank decides to embrace his role as a superhero. He calls himself 'The Marketing Marvel' and starts offering his glowing advice more openly, wearing a custom suit that symbolizes a light bulb.
As news of his abilities spread, Frank faces a dilemma. A large corporation tries to hire him exclusively, tempting him with vast resources but potentially limiting the reach of his help.
Frank refuses the corporate offer, choosing instead to continue serving a variety of clients. His day is filled with back-to-back sessions where his advice solves complex marketing challenges.
With a full heart and a clearer vision, Frank spends a quiet day at home, reflecting on the impact he's made. He resolves to continue using his power to illuminate and inspire the business world.

ending: Thus, Frank Alexander continued to shine a light on a path to success and creativity, remaining a beacon of hope and innovation in the marketing world.
moral: True power lies in using one's abilities to help others grow and succeed.
